tool_description: This API calculates the option values depending on values provided to it accordingly Black Scholes option calculation model.
name: Black Scholes Stock Options Calculation
title: Black Scholes Stock Options Calculation

api_list.name: Calculate Options Value
api_list.description: Pass the parameter like Spot Price, Strike Price, Time to expiry, Implied Volatility, Risk-free return, and stocks divided and it will calculate all of the parameters and the values with the change of each underlying value like time, volatility, risk-free return, or change in the spot price.
